name: Dark Chocolate Sea Salt Truffles
description: Rich, creamy, and perfectly salted, these truffles are crafted from single-origin cocoa beans for a deeply nuanced flavor.

name: 70% Single-Origin Bar
description: Intense and aromatic, our 70% bar highlights the true character of our Ecuadorian cocoa beans.

name: Hazelnut Praline Bonbons
description: Delicate hazelnut crunch meets velvety chocolate in these heavenly bonbons.
